base_prompt: What gas do plants absorb during photosynthesis?
base_response: Plants absorb carbon dioxide gas during photosynthesis.

variation_responses.What petrol do plants absorb during phot: Plants absorb carbon dioxide (CO2) during photosynthesis, not petrol.
variation_responses.Can you tell me: What gas do plants abso: Plants primarily absorb carbon dioxide (CO2) during photosynthesis.
variation_responses.What gas do plants absorb during photosy: Plants primarily absorb carbon dioxide (CO2) during photosynthesis.
